# MdTable.Count Property

**Declaring Type:** [MdTable](../index.md)

Gets the number of rows in the table.

```csharp
public int Count { get; }
```

## Property Value

int

The number of rows in the table.

## Remarks

This property is equivalent to [RowCount](RowCount.md).
